issue.title: [R] Windows build can fail if building only shared libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15667](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15667). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should only affect dev environments. I noticed that when I build with shared libraries only that it fails because it's expecting arrow_bundled_dependencies, which I think we only build as part of static builds.
